name: Average Lab Test Results
query:
select 
    TR.project, date_format(TR.sample_date_time,"%%Y-%%m") as Month, TR.parameter, format(avg(TR.test_value),2) as Test_value, 
    format(avg(TR.upper_range),2) as Upper_range, format(avg(TR.lower_range),2) as lower_range 
    from 
    (select  
        ltr.name, ltr.project, ltr.lab_test_structure, sample_date_time, prv.parameter, prv.test_value, 
        prv.uom,ltsd.lower_range, ltsd.upper_range,ltsd.contracted, ltsd.percent_change 
        from `tabLab Test Results` ltr   
        left join `tabParameter Result Values` as prv on ltr.name=prv.parent 
        left join 
        (select 
            ts.name as lab_structure, pdv.parameter, pdv.uom, pdv.upper_range, pdv.lower_range,  
            pdv.percent_change, pdv.contractually_required as Contracted      
            from `tabLab Test Structure` ts  
            left join  `tabParameter Detail Values` pdv on ts.name = pdv.parent order by ts.name)  as ltsd 
        on ltr.lab_test_structure = ltsd.lab_structure and prv.parameter=ltsd.parameter) TR 
    group by  TR.project, TR.parameter, Month order by Month;

name: Master Data Check
query:
select  
    p.customer, p.name as Project, date_format(p.creation,"%%y-%%m-%%d") `Created on`, 
    p.sales_order, lts.name as 'Lab Structure', W.num_water as "# of Height Measurements", LTR.Num_Tests as "# of Lab Test Results" 
from tabProject p 
left join `tabLab Test Structure` lts  on p.name = lts.project 
left join  (select project,  count(height) as Num_water from `tabWater Height Measurement` group by project) W on p.name = W.project 
left join (select project, count(sample_date_time) as Num_Tests from `tabLab Test Results`) LTR on p.name = LTR.project

order by p.customer, p.name;
report_script:
select  
    p.name as Project, 
    date_format(p.creation,"%%y-%%m-%%d") `Created on`,p.customer, p.sales_order, 
    lts.name as 'Lab Structure', W.num_water , LTR.Num_Tests 
from tabProject p 
left join `tabLab Test Structure` lts  on p.name = lts.project 
left join (select project,  count(height) as Num_water from `tabWater Height Measurement` group by project) W on p.name = W.project 
left join (select project, count(sample_date_time) as Num_Tests from `tabLab Test Results`) LTR on p.name = LTR.project;
